org.netbeans.api.debugger.jpda

Interface MutableVariable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Variable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Field, JPDAWatch, LocalVariable

    public interface MutableVariable
extends Variable
    Represents a variable that can be modified. 
     Since JDI interfaces evolve from one version to another, it's strongly recommended
 not to implement this interface in client code. New methods can be added to
 this interface at any time to keep up with the JDI functionality.
    Since:
    2.44
    See Also:
    LocalVariable, Field, JPDAWatch

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFromMirrorObject(Object obj)
      Set the value of this variable to match the given mirror object.
      void setValue(String value)
      Sets a value represented as text, to this variable.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.netbeans.api.debugger.jpda.Variable

        createMirrorObject, getType, getValue

    • Method Detail

      • setValue

        void setValue(String value)
       throws InvalidExpressionException
        Sets a value represented as text, to this variable.
        Parameters:
        value - The string value to be set to this variable
        Throws:
        InvalidExpressionException - if the expression is not correct

      • setFromMirrorObject

        void setFromMirrorObject(Object obj)
                  throws InvalidObjectException
        Set the value of this variable to match the given mirror object.
        Parameters:
        obj - The mirror object
        Throws:
        InvalidObjectException - when it was not possible to set value of this variable from the provided object.
        See Also:
        Variable.createMirrorObject()
